tuv.seg: Nomination of Candidates for election to the European Parliament
Iarrthóirí a ainmniú do bhallraíocht i bParlaimint na hEorpa
In order to be nominated for election of the European Parliament, you may either nominate yourself or one elector for the constituency may nominate you
Ar mhaithe le bheith ainmnithe do bhallraíocht i bParlaimint na hEorpa, is féidir leat thú féin a ainmniú nó is féidir le vótálaí eile don toghcheantar tú a ainmniú
You must complete a "nomination paper" and present it to the returning officer for your constituency
Ní mór duit "páipéar ainmniúcháin" a chomhlánú agus é a thabhairt don cheann comhairimh i do thoghcheantar
If you wish, you may state your party affiliation on your nomination paper
Más mian leat, is féidir leat aon cheangail atá agat le páirtí a lua ar an bpáipéar ainmniúcháin
If you are not a member of an Irish political party but you are member of a political group in the European Parliament, you may have the name of that group included on all ballot papers and notices

Muna bhfuil tú i do bhall de pháirtí polaitiúil Éireannach ach más ball de ghrúpa polaitiúil i bParlaimint na hEorpa thú, is féidir leat ainm an ghrúpa sin a chur ar na páipéir bhallóide agus ar fhógraí
You may also submit a photograph and/or a political party emblem to appear on the ballot paper
Is féidir leat freisin griangraf a chur ar fáil agus/nó logo den pháirtí polaitiúil le cur ar an bpáipéar ballóide

If you are not an Irish or U.K. citizen, you must also make a statutory declaration and produce an attestation from your home Member State that you are not disqualified from standing as a candidate there

Más rud é nach saoránach Éireannach nó saoránach den Ríocht Aontaithe thú, ní mór duit dearbhú reachtúil a dhéanamh agus fianaise a chur ar fáil ón mballstát as a thagann tú a dhearbhaíonn nach bhfuil tú dícháilithe le seasamh mar iarrthóir sa bhallstát sin
The returning officer must decide on the validity of your nomination paper within one hour after it is presented to him or her
Ní mór don cheann comhairimh cinneadh a dhéanamh an bhfuil do pháipéar ainmniúcháin bailí taobh istigh de uair a chloig tar éis dó/dí an páipéar a fháil
He or she will object to your name (or description) if
Cuirfidh sé/sí i gcoinne d'ainm (nó an cur síos ort):
• it is not the name by which you are commonly known
• más rud é nach é seo an t-ainm mar is fearr aithne ort
• it is misleading or likely to cause confusion
• más rud é go bhféadfadh sé daoine a chur amú
• it is unnecessarily long or
• má tá sé ró-fhada gan fáth nó
• it contains a political reference
• má tá tagairt pholaitiúil ann
You must change the particulars on the nomination paper if the returning officer raises an objection
Ní mór duit na sonraí ar an bpáipéar ainmniúcháin a athrú má chuireann an ceann comhairimh ina gcoinne
The returning officer must hold that your nomination paper is valid if it is properly filled out and signed
Ní mór don cheann comhairimh glacadh go bhfuil do pháipéar ainmniúcháin bailí má tá sé líonta amach i gceart agus sínithe

In the case of a national of a Member State other than Ireland or the U.K, the returning officer may refuse to hold the paper valid if it is not accompanied by the necessary declaration and attestation regarding eligibility to stand

I gcás náisiúnaigh de Bhallstát eile seachas Éire nó an RA, is féidir leis an gceann comhairimh diúltú glacadh go bhfuil an páipéar ballóide bailí muna bhfuil an dearbhú cuí in éineacht leis agus fianaise a bhaineann le intofaíocht seasaimh
As a candidate at a European Parliament election, you are entitled to send one election letter free of postage charge to every elector in the constituency
Mar iarrthóir i dtoghchán do Pharlaimint na hEorpa tá sé de chead agat litir amháin um thoghchán a chur saor in aisce ón gcostas poist chuig gach vótálaí sa toghcheantar
If you are a member of a political party with another candidate in the constituency, you will only be allowed one election letter free of postage charge between you
Más ball de pháirtí polaitiúil thú agus iarrthóir eile den pháirtí céanna ag seasamh sa toghcheantar céanna, ní bheidh cead agaibh ach litir amháin saor ó chostas poist a chur amach eadraibh
To be nominated for membership of the European Parliament, candidates must either:
Chun a bheith ainmnithe do bhallraíocht i bParlaimint na hEorpa, ní mór do na hiarrthóirí:
• Produce a Certificate of Party Affiliation or
Teastas Ceangail Pháirtí a chur ar fáil nó
• Produce a document containing 60 signatures of "assenters" who are registered voters in the constituency or
Cáipéis ar a bhfuil 60 sínithe de dhaoine a thacaíonn leat atá cláraithe mar vótálaithe sa toghcheantar nó
• Pay a deposit of €1,800
Éarlais de € 1,800 a íoc
To "assent" to the nomination, the voters must sign the candidate's nomination paper and show photographic identification to the local authority official in charge
Le tacú leis an ainmniúchán ní mór do na votálaithe páipéar ballóide an iarrthóra a shíniú agus fianaise aitheantais le griangraf a thaispeáint don oifigeach i gceannas san údarás áitiúil
A person can only assent to one nomination per election
Ní féidir le duine tacú ach le iarrthóir amháin ag gach toghchán
If you wish to supply a photograph or a party emblem, it must meet certain requirements regarding shape and size
Más mian leat griangraf nó logo páirtí a chur ar fáil ní mór dó a bheith caighdeánach ó thaobh crutha agus méid
If you do not supply a photograph and/or emblem, the space or spaces provided on the ballot paper will be left blank
Muna gcuireann tú griangraf agus/nó logo ar fáil beidh an spás nó na spásanna atá curtha ar fáil lena n-aghaidh ar an bpáipéar ballóide fágtha bán
There is no charge for applying for nomination for election to the European Parliament
Níl aon táille le n-íoc le bheith ainmnithe do bhallraíocht i bParlaimint na hEorpa
You must obtain a nomination paper from the returning officer for your constituency
Ní mór duit páipéar ainmniúcháin a fháil ón gceann comhairimh i do thoghcheantar
You must apply to the returning officer for your constituency who is either a City or County Sheriff or a County Registrar
Ní mór duit iarratas a chur chuig an gceann comhairimh i do thoghcheantar atá ina S(h)irriam Cathrach nó Contae nó ina C(h)láraitheoir Contae
Contact information for the returning officer for your constituency is available from the Franchise Section of your local authority
Tá eolas faoi theagmháil le ceann comhairimh do dháilcheantair le fáil ón Rannóg Vótaíochta i d'údarás áitiúil
There is more information on european elections on the website of the Department of Housing, Planning, Community and Local Government
Tá tuilleadh eolais maidir le toghcháin na hEorpa ar láithreán gréasáin na Roinne Tithíochta, Pleanála, Pobail agus Rialtais Áitiúil
